Package org.fudgemsg

The core API for working with Fudge encoded data.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
FudgeField A read-only representation of a field which is contained in a fudge message, or a stream of fudge encoded data.
FudgeFieldContainer An interface defining any arbitrary container for fields that can be described by the Fudge specification.
MutableFudgeFieldContainer An extension for FudgeFieldContainer that allows the contents of a message to be mutated.
 

Class Summary
FudgeContext The primary entry-point for code to interact with the rest of the Fudge system.
FudgeFieldPrefixCodec A container for all the utilities for working with fudge field prefixes.
FudgeFieldType<TValue> The class defining the type of a particular field.
FudgeMsg A container for FudgeMsgFields.
FudgeMsgEnvelope Wraps a FudgeMsg for the purpose of encoding the envelope header.
FudgeMsgField A concrete implementation of FudgeField suitable for inclusion in a pre-constructed FudgeMsg or a stream of data.
FudgeMsgFormatter Allows for pretty-printing of FudgeMsg instances.
FudgeStreamDecoder Reads Fudge objects from streams.
FudgeStreamEncoder Writes Fudge objects to streams.
FudgeTypeDictionary Contains all the FudgeFieldType definitions for a particular Fudge installation.
ModifiedUTF8Util Code relating to working with Modified UTF-8 data.
UnknownFudgeFieldValue Container for a variable-sized field with a type that the current installation of Fudge cannot handle on decoding.
 

Exception Summary
FudgeRuntimeException A Fudge-specific subclass of RuntimeException for all non-checked-exceptions generated by Fudge.
 

Package org.fudgemsg Description

The core API for working with Fudge encoded data.

In general, most applications will start with an instance of FudgeContext, and use that to read, write, and persist instances of FudgeMsg.
